title: Enhancing Advanced Mathematical Problem-Solving Competencies Through Video-Supported Collaborative Learning [K-12]

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary-level college mathematics fundamentals (functions, calculus, etc.)
context.additional_context: Collaborative learning environment utilizing smartphone-based video creation/sharing tools

learning_goals: Collaborate with team members to produce a 5-minute explanatory video solving complex mathematical problems
Analyze peer-created problem-solving videos and suggest three improvements
Improve personal mathematical problem-solving strategies by over 80% using video-based feedback
Apply three visual representation techniques using the VSCL tool (smartphone recording/editing app)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
